statements: DELETE FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance WHERE car_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
DELETE FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM repair_history WHERE repair_date < '2022-01-01' AND description ILIKE '%engine%';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE car_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM repair_history WHERE repair_id = 1002 AND repair_cost > 500;
DELETE FROM repair_history WHERE technician = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE car_id = 123 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM repair_history WHERE car_id = 456 AND cost > 500;
DELETE FROM location WHERE latitude > 40.123456 AND longitude < -70.987654;
